The Tamil Integrated Nutrition Programme II (TINP II) ran from 1990â€“1997, and coverage was 
approximately 80% by area (316/385 rural blocks). TINP II intensity of CHWs and resources was 
the same as TINP I ( 22). The sustained rate of reduction in population underweight attributed to 
TINP II was 1.1 ppt/year (40).
